title: Buddy Chat
imagePromptPlaceholder: Describe the image you want to generate...
welcomeMessage: Start a conversation with one of our AI models.
shortcuts: Press / to focus input • Esc to close settings
onboardingStep1: This assistant combines multiple AI models to help answer your questions.
onboardingStep2: You can choose between Gemini, Claude, and Mistral AI models.
onboardingStep3: Customize your experience with themes, font sizes, and more.
clearConfirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all messages?
quickCommandsDescription: Use these shortcuts to quickly add common prompts to your message
analyzeTemplate: What are the pros and cons of [topic]?
feedbackPlaceholder: Tell us more about your experience with this response...
enterUsernamePrompt: Please enter your name to personalize your chat experience
storageUnavailable: Local storage is unavailable. Your chat history and settings will not be saved between sessions.
importError: Error importing chat history. The file format may be invalid.
storageLimitReached: Storage limit reached. Some older messages have been removed to make space.
clearAllDataConfirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all your data? This will remove chat history, settings and preferences.
dataCleared: All data has been cleared successfully.
apiKeysDescription: Enter your own API keys to use with different AI models. This allows you to use your personal quota and customizations.
apiKeysSecurity: Your API keys are stored securely in your browser's local storage and are only sent to their respective services.
missingApiKey: Missing API key. Please provide your own API key in Settings → API Keys.
invalidApiKey: Invalid API key. Please check your API key in Settings.
chatModesDesc: Select a chat mode to optimize the AI's responses for your specific needs.
standardModeDesc: Balanced responses for general conversation and questions.
creativeModeDesc: More imaginative and expressive responses with unique perspectives.
preciseModeDesc: Factual, accurate answers with less creativity for direct information.
codingModeDesc: Optimized for programming help with well-formatted code examples.
learningModeDesc: Educational responses with detailed explanations and examples.
conciseModeDesc: Brief, to-the-point answers without unnecessary details.
